title: Distinguish between when actively using the app and when it's on in the background
body: I've found the app to be easy to use and really nice design wise. My only gripe so far is that it constantly shows you as online, and can't distinguish between when you are actively using the app and when you're not even on your phone. I've received quite a few messages from people thinking that I've been online when I haven't even been near my phone. I think changing the text to red while keeping the mobile icon, or doing something similar will be beneficial as people can still message you, but also know that you are away.

replies.body:
Or maybe they can just make us offline as soon as we close the app/ end task. If we just hit the back button or home button it'll allow the app to run in the background.

Preferably I'd like to hit the back button and have an option appear asking "quit or cancel" or something like most apps have.
